items.title: How To Be Totally Free & Paperless & Digital in 2 Weeks!
items.headline: How to Free yourself from the bulky, time consuming world of paper and other "Stuff" & Live a Life of Freedom.
objectives_summary: You will be able to Step by step install and use apps and easy software to scan all your paper items.
No tech skills needed.
Use your smartphone to immediatly give you access to all of your lifes needs and information.

items.title: Immigration! Applying for a "U.S Family Based Green Card"
items.headline: How to apply for a U.S Green Card without paying for an expensive Immigration Attorney and save thousands in fees.
objectives_summary: Students will be able to launch a "Green Card" application for a spouse, parent, brother, sister, biological child, adoptive child or a step child.
Required supporting documents needed for U.S citizens or Lawful Permanent Residents to prove the merits of their case.
You will be able to accurately complete the recently revised Form I-130 and/or Form I-130A (Green Card Application).
